DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate safety effectiveness Micro-Serum/Micro-Blood ( finger Stick ) Specimen Collection compare sample obtain standard venipuncture ( blood take arm vein ) . The information data obtain used finish development convenience kit allow doctor provide patient method blood test clinical laboratory test convenience home without visit doctor 's office clinic .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Ability understand follow verbal write instruction English 2 . Demonstrate willingness participate provide write informed consent 3 . Aged 18 80 year age obvious sign illness ( e.g . fever , vomit ) 4 . Diabetics diagnose 6 month ago longer prefer . However , nondiabetics accept study . 1 . Withdrawn inform consent 2 . Mental physical impairment would preclude participation 3 . Any condition , opinion Principle Investigator site study coordinator , make participant unsuitable study . This include limited mental physical impairment , would preclude provision adequate knowledgeable consent .
